title: Isla Stone: Witch way
description: Driven by her self proclaimed destiny to be the ultimate supernatural being of her generation, Isla Stone finds herself standing in the middle of her own Engagement party with her future husband, a man she had no feelings for. Marrying him would definitely put her on the path to fulfilling her destiny and put her in the history books forever. As the party is stormed by evil beings Isla fights back but instantly falls for her attacker. As the attacker is revealed to be the murderer of Isla's mother she tries to fight her feelings for him. Believing her mother is sending messages from beyond the grave to follow her heart and go for true love no matter what the cost. Isla turns her back on her loved ones to protect the man who killed one of their own and in the process destroys her own family and creates a path of destruction for the whole supernatural world.
author: Ellis Maton
